id.description: The unique identifier for the contact.

first_name.description: The first name of the contact.

last_name.description: The last name of the contact.

company_name.description: The name of the company associated with the contact.

information.description: Additional information or notes about the contact.

is_shared.description: Indicates whether the contact is shared among multiple users.

direct_link.description: A direct link to access detailed information about the contact.

created_at.description: The date and time when the contact was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the contact was last updated.

phone_numbers.description: An array of phone numbers associated with the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier for the phone number entry.

label.description: The label or type of the phone number (e.g., mobile, office).

emails.description: An array of email addresses associated with the contact.

id.description: The unique identifier for the email entry.

label.description: The label or type of the email address (e.g., work, personal).
